      • transaction

        <R,C> R transaction(Function1<? super C,? extends R> f)

        Creates a new transaction to the database. f Handles creation and closing the transaction connection automatically and manages connection pools in the background. R result type.

        See Also:
        f

      • multiQuery

        <R,C> java.util.List<R> multiQuery(C connection,
                                   java.lang.String sqlStatement,
                                   Function1<? super java.util.Map<java.lang.String,? extends java.lang.Object>,? extends R> f,
                                   java.lang.Object... parameters)

        Creates a query to the database with the given sqlStatement parameters. Iterates the result set automatically. Does not close the connection. R result type.

        <C> long insert(C connection,
